attributes.action: Iranian Pastor facing death for being a Christian
attributes.additional_details:
An Iranian Pastor is currently facing the death penalty for  being a Christian in Iran a Muslim country ( the alleged crime of Apostasy )

I would like this matter discussed in parliament with a view to asking the Supreme Leader of Iran to review the sentence.

Freedom of thought, conscience and religion is a crucial part of the Human Rights act and we should speak up for those principals.
